languages.text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник персонажа применяет Под защитой, этот союзник своей следующей атакой наносит на 33% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток от обладателя сапог.

traits.locale_text: [draft] After using Following wielders' allies gains +33% damage to next attack for each ally within 2-cell radius from wielder
Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.
Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.
Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

languages.text: 每当装备者的盟友使用跟随战友！之后，该盟友下次攻击时，周围2格内每有一名其他盟友，造成的伤害都会提高33%。{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用跟随战友！之后，装备者的所有盟友下次攻击时，2格内每有一名盟友，造成的伤害都会提高33%。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: 着用者の味方が追従！を使用すると、着用者の周囲2セル以内にいる味方1人ごとに、次の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+33％増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が追従！を使用した後、着用者から周囲2セル以内の味方は1人ごとに次の攻撃のダメージに対して33％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cuando un aliado del portador usa ¡Te sigo!, inflige un +33 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con su siguiente ataque por cada aliado en un radio de 2 casillas del portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa ¡Te sigo!, sus aliados ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +33 % al daño de su siguiente aliado por cada aliado en un radio de 2 casillas del portador.

languages.text: Setzt der Verbündete des Trägers Folge! ein, verursacht er mit seinem nächsten Angriff für jeden Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um den Träger +33 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem der Träger Folge! nutzt, erlangen seine Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +33 % auf den Schaden ihres nächsten Angriff für jeden Verbündeten, der sich innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius vom Träger befindet.

Nachdem der Träger Folge! nutzt, erlangen seine Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +33 % auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} ihres nächsten Angriff für jeden Verbündeten, der sich innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius vom Träger befindet.

languages.text: Когда союзник персонажа применяет Под защитой, этот союзник своей следующей атакой наносит на 33% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток от обладателя сапог.
languages.original_text: After the wearer uses Following!, the wearer's allies gain a +33% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius from the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж применяет Под защитой, его союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к урону от следующей совершаемой атаки +33% за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток от персонажа.
Когда персонаж применяет Под защитой, его союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к урону от следующей совершаемой атаки +33% за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток от персонажа.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un allié du porteur utilise Suivre !, sa prochaine attaque inflige +33 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires pour chaque allié situé dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du porteur.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's ally uses Following!, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Suivre !, chaque allié situé dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts de +33 % lors de son attaque suivante.

Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Suivre !, chaque allié situé dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +33 % lors de son attaque suivante.

languages.text: Upon using {g|f:a39d7daf9b884978a66ef00675b2766f}Following!{/g}, the wearer's alliy gains a +33% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius from the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Upon using {g|f:a39d7daf9b884978a66ef00675b2766f}Following!{/g}, the wearer's alliy gains a +33% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius from the wearer.
